summary: A basic follower named Arrow, I might develop it further if I get enough attention :)
descriptionHtml:
Hey, This is my first mod (that's been published) if you look at the mod data you'll see how messy it is [size=1](it shouldn't cause any problems with other mods... I think)[/size].
Its a basic follower named Arrow (comment if you've got a better name). She has her own armour, sword, bow as well as CBBE body and SG-Hair (I didn't make them I just "borrowed' them) also she has chain lightning. As of now she is based i[color=#cccccc]n the Nightgate Inn and doesn't have any custom dialogue or quest but if I get enough attention I might add it (I don't know how currently).
I am open to any suggestions, but seriously like anything  (Please don't hate)

[/color]Mods Used/Stole the Meshes and Textures off :)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52700/? - Sword
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60660/? - Bow
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11050/? - Armour (inverted the skirted version textures) 
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13180/? - Body Texture (I used body slide also)
author: Arrow360
